title: What law enforcement agency (if any) as jurisdiction over the unihabited barrier islands (ie. Leah Island at the southern tip of Topsail Island) in the area? In other words, who would someone contact if they had an incident while visiting one of these islands?
text:
I think this previous story at StarNewsOnline.com should answer your
question:
